name: Ryakhovsky test
description: Test for identifying communicative abilities Test for determining the level of sociability
instruction: Sociability— necessary quality in communication. Check how developed it is with you and what you need to improve your own communication technique. Answer the questions 'yes', 'sometimes' or 'no'
